SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies.pdf: Página 46
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work 
46 
HEURISTIC 2. MEREOLOGY REUSE II 
Heuristic 2 (mereology reuse II). If the CQ refers to a relation S that is a subrelation of an R that meets 
conditions CM1 and CM2, then an implemented mereology should be reused.
